wmarcy01>> American Universities must be in a real crisis if they let You atend them. You can't even write proper English.
PNAC is imperialism and terrorism can't be won by military means since once you use the military you are in effect participating in it.

If 'wmarcy01' ever heard Chomsky lecture at MIT, it was some time ago, since he's been professor emeritus (retired from teaching) for quite a while now.  He also never heard Chomsky lecture on politics: he is a professor of linguistics--by far the most important linguist, perhaps philosopher or scientist, of the twentieth century--not of political science.  Plus it's obvious from the quality of his writing alone that 'wmarcy01' is unlikely ever to have made it into a university the caliber of MIT.

Aside from all that, he seems to think it's some sort of blasphemy to 'hate America', whatever that means. Chomsky might be said to hate militarism & plutocracy, but then, so do all right-thinking persons. It's hardly his fault that the US is governed by those philsophies.
